events.title: Watch Batman V Superman with Zack Snyder !
events.text:
To show support for Zack we are encouraging all fans to stage a Worldwide collective watch party of Batman V Superman: Dawn Of Justice Ultimate Edition.

The idea is Buy, Rent, Stream or Watch it on Blu-Ray whlist posting/tweeting as many pictures of you doing so with the Hashtag #BvS.

As this is a Global event, screenings will take place throughout all timezones.
